channel.title: imprinting on Notes and Bits of Kisun Pokharel
channel.description: Recent content in imprinting on Notes and Bits of Kisun Pokharel

item.title: Genomic imprinting (review articles, 1cp)
item.description: Based on the following Review articles Genomic imprinting in mammals. Barlow DP, Bartolomei MS. Cold Spring Harbor Perspectives in Biology, (2014) link 20pp Genomic imprinting and parent-of-origin effects on complex traits. Lawson HA, Cheverud JM, Wolf JB. Nature Reviews Genetics. (2013) link (10pp) Genomic imprinting: the emergence of an epigenetic paradigm. Ferguson-Smith AC. Nature Reviews Genetics. (2011) link (12pp) Genomic imprinting effects on complex traits in domesticated animal species.
